flavorText:
"Let all witness the fate of those who defy me."
—Crovax

foreignData.name: Umsturz
foreignData.text: Entferne eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl mit der größten Stärke aus dem Spiel. (Wenn zwei oder mehr Kreaturen gemeinsam die größte Stärke haben, wähle nur eine davon.)

name: Topple
originalText: Remove target creature with the greatest power from the game. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target only one of them.)

rulings.text: It can only target a creature with the greatest power. This means you pick such a creature on announcement, and if that creature is not still the one with greatest power on resolution, then this spell doesn’t resolve since its target is illegal.

text: Exile target creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target any one of them.)
